trans-unit.source: Instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: Instrui o [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para desabilitar o processamento obrigatório de cabeçalhos não o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>coleção deve ser entendida de acordo com o SOAP 1.1 e 1.2 especificações.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders*>

trans-unit.source: By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cliente ou serviço de tempo de execução lança uma exceção quando encontra um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>em uma mensagem para a qual o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `true` , mas o cabeçalho não está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para a mensagem.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this behavior, use the MustUnderstandBehavior and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar esse comportamento, use o MustUnderstandBehavior e defina o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é usado em cenários em que o conteúdo da mensagem deve ser retransmitida em outro lugar e não processados, como um serviço de roteador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"></xref> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior"> </xref> classe usando o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Passar `false` como o `validate` parâmetro para esse construtor para impedir que uma exceção de ser lançada quando o tempo de execução encontra uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>em uma mensagem para a qual o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `true` , mas o cabeçalho não está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para a mensagem.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""></xref> headers.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se é para impor a validação de <xref uid="langword_csharp_mustUnderstand" name="mustUnderstand" href=""> </xref> cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Oferece suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>para dar suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade ao qual o comportamento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters for the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de associação para o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor de <> </> *> para o <> </> *> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>método para dar suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade ao qual o comportamento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to set.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução do cliente para definir.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand*> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand*> property.
trans-unit.target: Atribui o valor de <> </> *> para o <> </> *> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>para dar suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade ao qual o comportamento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher to set.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher definido.

trans-unit.source: Supports behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Oferece suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>método para dar suporte à funcionalidade de comportamento.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade para validar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se é garantir que um cabeçalho é compreendido de acordo com o SOAP 1.1 e 1.2 especificações.

trans-unit.source: Set the ValidateMustUnderstand property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade ValidateMustUnderstand como `false` para impedir que uma exceção de ser lançada quando o tempo de execução encontra uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>em uma mensagem para a qual o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade `true` , mas o cabeçalho não está no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para a mensagem.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cabeçalho deve ser processado corretamente ou uma falha é lançada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
